os.fullpath: Operating System :: Modern (Vendor-Supported) Desktop Operating Systems :: Linux

name: Tony Linux
summary: A small Linux distro customized for my use.
short_description:
Tony Linux is a small, lightweight distribution that I built from an Ubuntu CLI install, with all the tools I typically use. I built an environment from component parts, and loved how it came out, so I decided to package it all up with Remastersys and share it with the world.

Right now the only available iso is 64-bit. I'll get around to maintaining a 32-bit version eventually. See the wiki for more information.
